quickSteps: Open the pair BTC→ETH on ETZ Swap and confirm the live quote for your target amount.
Update BTC/ETH wallets, back up seeds, and create a fresh ETH receiving address.
Pick quote logic: Fixed (exact amount) or Floating (tighter pricing).
Send a small BTC test; verify ETH arrival and payout behavior.
Send the main BTC amount in 1–2 parts; check your ETH balance after each.

seo.title: BTC to ETH: Simple Reasons and a Calm, Repeatable Swap
seo.description: Clear reasons to rotate from Bitcoin to Ether and a safe, step-by-step process you can reuse.
